void iField_getDescription (iField_Instance instance, char *descr, int descr_len)
 Get a description of the error returned from the last iField function.

Function Documentation

void iField_getDescription ( iField_Instance  instance,
char *  descr,
int  descr_len 
)

Get a description of the error returned from the last iField function.

Get a description of the error returned from the last iField function. Space must be allocated by the caller.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iField instance handle
descr  [in,out] Pointer to a character string to be filled with a description of the error from the last iField function
descr_len  [in] Length of the character string pointed to by descr
